column1: Pusako Anak Nagari Airport is a domestic airport that serves flight from and to Simpang Ampek. The airport is located in Jorong Laban
column6: Indonesia. The type of aircraft can land at the airport is Cassa 212. The Airport resides at an elevation of 40 m (131 ft) above mean sea level. It has one runway with an asphalt surface measuring 1
column8: 281 ft) in length. The operation of the Airport is managed by UPT Ditjen Hubud
column9: an agency under Ministry of Transportation
